mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID , NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , REGEXP_REPLACE(ADDRESS, '-|\$', ' ') ADDRESS , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , ACC_CREATION_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R , MEMBER_ID , NAME , REGEXP_REPLACE(PHONE, '(.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') PHONE , EMAIL , REGEXP_REPLACE(ADDRESS, '-|\$', ' ') ADDRESS , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , ACC_CREATION_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM <= #{ currentPageNo } * #{ recordsPerPage } ORDER BY ACC_CREATION_DATE DESC ) WHERE R > (#{ currentPageNo } - 1) * #{ recordsPerPage }

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.AGREEMENT , A.ACC_INACTIVE_YN , A.TEMP_PWD_YN , A.ACCUM_LOGIN_COUNT , A.LOGIN_FAILED_COUNT , A.LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , A.ACC_CREATION_DATE , A.ACC_CHANGED_DATE , A.ACC_CLOSING_DATE , A.ACC_CLOSING_YN FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'N' AND MEMBER_ID NOT IN (SELECT A.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE B.AUTHORITY_CODE = 2)

SELECT COUNT(A.MEMBER_ID) FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE A.ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'N' AND B.AUTHORITY_CODE = 2
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_ID) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'Y'

SELECT MEMBER_ID , NAME , REGEXP_REPLACE(PHONE, '(.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') PHONE , EMAIL , REGEXP_REPLACE(ADDRESS, '-|\$', ' ') ADDRESS , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , ACC_CREATION_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'N' AND MEMBER_ID NOT IN (SELECT A.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE B.AUTHORITY_CODE = 2) ORDER BY ACC_CREATION_DATE

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , REGEXP_REPLACE(A.PHONE, '(.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') PHONE , A.EMAIL , REGEXP_REPLACE(A.ADDRESS, '-|\$', ' ') ADDRESS , A.LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , A.ACC_CREATION_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE A.ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'N' AND B.AUTHORITY_CODE = 2
SELECT B.MEMBER_ID , B.ACC_SUSP_DESC , A.ACC_CLOSING_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_SUSP B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_ID) FROM TBL_ROLE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ROLE ( MEMBER_ID , AUTHORITY_CODE ) VALUES ( #{ memberId } , 2 )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET ACC_CLOSING_YN = 'Y' , ACC_CLOSING_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
